message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I'm afraid $750000 is still a bit below my minimum requirement. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $850000. I hope this is within your range.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, $850000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $925000. This is the highest I can go, considering the product's value. What do you think?

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $875000. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.

I understand your position, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum requirement. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $950000. This is the final offer I can make. What do you think?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose an offer of $900000. I hope this is acceptable.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer, so I'm sticking with $950000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept your last offer of $950000. I look forward to making the purchase.
